name: Scruffybird
description:
This is a game originally named scruffybird; However, I misspelled scuffy, which is honestly very fitting.  This game is an allegory of our own lives, as we are all God fearing Christians, or at least we should be. You play as Matthew, son of Christ, reborn as a bird and left to the final challenge to see if you can make it into heaven. The reason this is an allegory of our god fearing lives as death in this game physically harms you. Have fun!

(this is my first game ever finished and uploaded, no yt tutorial needed :))
